article_title: Israeli reports say man thought taken hostage has died.
sentence: Israeli  reports  say  man  thought  taken  hostage  has  died.

article_title: Israeli reports say man thought taken hostage has died.
sentence: It's  being  reported  in  Israeli  media  that  21-year-old  Jonathan  Samerano  ,  who  has  been  missing  since  7  October,  is  dead.
